Methods in View with parameters of type Card
static int Show.show_card(Card c)
          Observer: Displays the given Card on to a JOptionPane Panel.
static void Show.showDealCards(Card d)

static int Show.showSellCard(Card d)
          Observer: Displays the given Deal Card on to a JOptionPane Panel with the choices sell and Next Card.
